other_tests.findings: Only 5 (1.7%) of the 293 patients possessed a benign mutation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: All 5 subjects with a benign mutation had already manifested clinically severe expression of HCM.

other_tests.findings: All 5 individuals harboring a benign mutation have required surgical myectomy.
other_tests.changes_over_time: One individual underwent orthotopic heart transplantation at age 16 after myectomy.

other_tests.findings: Demonstrated severe residual diastolic dysfunction in one patient.
